scripts.clean-android: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/npm-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/npm-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-* && yarn cache clean && yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.clean-ios: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/npm-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/npm-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-* && rm -rf ios/buildÂ  && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/appName-* && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn cache clean && yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.install-pods: cd ios && rm -rf assets Pods Podfile.lock && pod cache clean --all && pod install --repo-update && cd ..
scripts.install-pods-m1: cd ios && rm -rf assets Pods Podfile.lock && pod cache clean --all && arch -x86_64 pod install --repo-update && cd ..
